schedule.title: Itinerary
schedule.subtitle: Saturday May 19th 2018
schedule.text:
16:00-17:00

Religious Ceremony @ Capilla de Nuestra Señora del Carmen, 5ta Avenida

18:00-19:00

Cocktail @ Playita Il Forno, Hacienda Tres Rios Hotel

19:00-00:00

Reception @Kakao Beach, Hacienda Tres Rios Hotel

hotel.title: Hotel
hotel.subtitle: Saturday May 19th 2018
hotel.text:
Nestled in a pristine 326-acre nature park near Playa del Carmen, Hacienda Tres Ríos is a beachfront all-inclusive resort located in the Riviera Maya forty-five minutes south of Cancún’s International Airport. The wedding group will enjoy an all-inclusive plan, which offers:


Included room service available 24 hours, unlimited meals and snacks in all bars and restaurants, exclusive access to activities and tours at Tres Rios Nature Park (Cenote snorkeling, kayak, hobie cat sailing, minigolf, etc), night shows and entertainment and more.

dresscode.title: Dresscode
dresscode.text:
👨🏽 Men

It's recommended to wear light, breathable fabrics like linen or cotton shirts.


👧 Women

Wear comfortable and sand friendly shoes. We'll be on the beach a cocktail short or long length evening dress is perfect and remember white is reserved for the bride

gifts.title: Gifts
gifts.subtitle: Saturday May 19th 2018
gifts.text: Because it will be difficult to bring 🎁 back to Holland by ✈️, we kindly request not to bring any gifts to the wedding. If you want to gift something you can make a contribution for the below ⬇️.
